text: Superman and Batman (also known as Batman and Superman) is the fictional two superheroes characters, meet for the first time in debut 1939, from the DC Comics, all comics such as Action Comics, Superman, Detective Comics, Batman, Batman and Robin and World's Finest Comics, created by Joe Shuster, Jerry Siegel, Bob Kane and Bill Finger, co-producers by Harry Donenfeld and Jack Liebowitz. DC Comics the hero's journey characters including Superman and Batman, my sidekick as Robin, my best friends Lois Lane, Supergirl, Batgirl and many others, and locations Metropolis and Gotham City, and from the clutches of the evil Lex Luthor and the evil Joker, and all supervillains Catwoman, Mr. Mxyzpltk and others. ==Appearances== The appeared together in a number of works, including: * Superman and Batman, all longest-running franchises (since 1938 and since 1939) * The Batman/Superman Hour, animated television series from 1968 to 1969 * The Superman/Batman Adventures, 1995 television series * The New Batman/Superman Adventures, 1997 television series * World's Finest, 2004 fan film * World's Finest Comics featuring Superman and Batman (commonly known as Batman and Superman), comic series from 1941 to 1986 * Superman and Batman versus Aliens and Predator, two-part comic series from 2007 * Superman/Batman, comic series that lasted from 2003 to 2011 * Superman & Batman: Generations, comic series that lasted from 1999 to 2004 * Superman and Batman: World's Funnest, comic book from 2000 * Batman/Superman/Wonder Woman: Trinity, comic series from 2003 * Trinity, comic series from 2008 to 2018 * The Batman/Superman Movie: World's Finest, 1997 direct-to-video film based on the comic series * Superman/Batman: Public Enemies, 2009 direct-to- video film based on the comic series * Superman/Batman: Apocalypse, 2010 direct-to-video sequel based on the comic series * Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, 2016 film directed by Zack Snyder * DC League of Super-Pets featuring Superman and Batman, 2022 computer-animated film based on the comic series Category:1939 establishments in the United States Category:DC Comics superheroes Category:Fictional business executives
title: Superman and Batman
